thread.title: Confirmed! Priyanka Chopra to attend Oscars 2017 with legendary singer Mick Jagger!
thread.title_full: Confirmed! Priyanka Chopra to attend Oscars 2017 with legendary singer Mick Jagger!

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE.
title: Confirmed! Priyanka Chopra to attend Oscars 2017 with legendary singer Mick Jagger!
text:
Priyanka Chopra with Mick Jagger Mumbai: After conquering Hollywood with her grace and elegance, Priyanka Chopra is all set to conquer Hollywood's biggest night, The Academy Awards.
Pee Cee took to Instagram and posted a selfie with legendary singer Mick Jagger as she confirmed that she indeed is going to attend the Oscars this coming Sunday.
Priyanka posted the picture with caption, "Change of plans! Oscars here we come. @mickjagger LA LA Land".
Going by the caption, we can see that the 'Quantico' star has also subtly declared that Damien Chazzelle's 'La La Land' is going to be the night's biggest winner.
On the work front, Priyanka Chopra is all set to make her big Hollywood debut with 'Baywatch', directed by Seth Gordon, which stars Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron.
